default: I have no clue what y'all saying!

.*provision.*.text: Hi, I found the following templates for you:

attachments.title: MBaaS/Android/IDE/git delivery template
attachments.text:
This template provisions:
* an MBaaS tenant
* AndroidIDE tenant
* connected git repo

attachments.title: MBaaS/iOS/Android integration template
attachments.text:
This template provisions:
* an MBaaS Queue tenant
* Android/iOS connectors

.*yo.*.text: yo yo yo, what's up dog
